struct_StatusOpts_98.name: StatusOpts
struct_StatusOpts_98.content:
type StatusOpts struct {
	Icon             string // if empty no icon will be shown
	Title            string
	TitleColor       color.Color
	Description      string
	DescriptionColor color.Color
	ExtraContent     string // additional content to append after the description
}

function_DiffFormatter_215.name: DiffFormatter
function_DiffFormatter_215.content:
func DiffFormatter() *diffview.DiffView {
	t := styles.CurrentTheme()
	formatDiff := diffview.New()
	style := chroma.MustNewStyle("nexora", styles.GetChromaTheme())
	diff := formatDiff.ChromaStyle(style).Style(t.S().Diff).TabWidth(4)
	return diff
}
